product_name: Columbia Insect Blocker Pants - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Help your kids enjoy a bite-free backcountry adventure. The Columbia Insect Blocker Pants for kids feature built-in bug repellent to let them play while the bugs stay away. Insect Blocker(R) repellent technology keeps biting insects away and lasts through 70 washes. Omni-Wick(TM) nylon fabric quickly wicks moisture away from skin; it also resists abrasion and offers lightweight breathability. Built-in UPF 30 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Elastic waist offers easy on/off and a secure fit. Columbia Bug Shield pants for kids feature a straight-leg fit. Closeout.
short_description: Help your kids enjoy a bite-free backcountry adventure. The Columbia Insect Blocker Pants for kids feature built-in bug repellent to let them play while the bugs stay away.
